lines.text: You have the right to be stupid as geek motherfuckers.
And there was always one... who seemed to like his job a little bit too much.
You know they shot that kid for no reason.
Oh you need a reason to get shot nowadays Jason? I don't think so.
Felt like a truck and shit, man. Except now they got me on heroin or some shit.
My court dates were so backed up that week, I hardly had any time left for school. Sometimes you had to stand around all morning when you got there. And you always run into a familiar face.
Our society tells us that they're criminals, hoodlums, animals. What I see everyday are confused children trying to find their way through a harsh and unforgiving world.
Back at school, I had to wait a half-an-hour because the metal detectors weren't working. Then somebody pulled the fire alarm. At that point, I just called it a day.
This is my groove. Don't fuck with my groove, nigga.
Yeah, bounce, motherfucker. Bounce or get bounced, punk.
Why don't you get a job motherfucker? Be all you can be.
Well hello, young lady. And what would your name be?
Here, go feed your family while you're at it.
Nigga you're worried about Roscoe. You better be worried about your momz.
Oh, you gonna mess with them critters yo?
Reach for the sky bucko.
Tommy, ring a bell?
They all look the same to me.
You done called backup on us, huh, bitch?
Man, watch your mouth. Can't you see what I'm doin' here?
You know I did, motherfucker.
She need to get her oil checked!
Now you're trying to instigate some Ritchie shit!
Some crap friends, man.
That's how they got me. It was the one time I didn't run. I just got tired of runnin'. Somethin' had to change. So be it. I'd take the time they gave me. I could handle it.
It was starting to feel like the walls was closin' in on me. You keep runnin' forever, you run out of places to go.
You tryin' to bring it to me or somethin'? What's up? What you want nigga, what's up?
It's almost like we were never there. We were just tryin' to make our mark in the world. Find somethin' we could call our own. And if I've changed at all, it's only because I've seen too much.
Yo, Wonder Woman called. She want her sweat pants back.
What's your name?
Dees.
Dees what?
Dees Nuts man. Spell it N-U-T-S.
